dao.name: QueryOnlyOrder
dao.statement: select * from PhotoOrder where status=? and makeStatus=? and memberSeq = 0

dao.name: QueryOnlyOrder2
dao.statement: select * from PhotoOrder where status=? and makeStatus=?

dao.name: QueryOrderByStatusAndMakeStatus
dao.statement: select a.*,b.userId from PhotoOrder a,member b where a.status=? and a.makeStatus=? and a.memberSeq=b.seq

dao.name: QueryOrderByMakeStatus
dao.statement: select * from PhotoOrder where makeStatus=?

dao.name: QueryOrderBySwfStatus
dao.statement: select * from PhotoOrder where makeStatus = ? and swfStatus = ?

dao.name: QueryOrderXML
dao.statement: select * from orderxml where orderSeq=?

dao.name: AddOrderXML
dao.statement: insert into orderxml(seq,orderSeq,GPID,orderNo,xml1,xml2) values(?,?,?,?,?,?)

dao.name: UpdateOrderXML2
dao.statement: update orderxml set xml2=? where orderSeq=?

dao.name: UpdateOrderPageData
dao.statement: update PhotoOrder set pageData=? where seq=?

dao.name: QueryOrderKinds
dao.statement: select * from orderkinds where seq = ?

dao.name: UpdateOrderPdfFail
dao.statement: update PhotoOrder set pdfFailNum=? where seq=?

dao.name: UpdateOrderMakeStatus
dao.statement: update PhotoOrder set makeStatus=? where seq=?

dao.name: UpdateOrderPdfPath
dao.statement: update PhotoOrder set pdfPath=?,coverPdfPath=?,insidePath=?,copyrightPath=?,titlePath=?, makeStatus=?,swfStatus=? where seq=?

dao.name: UpdateOrderSwfStatus
dao.statement: update PhotoOrder set swfStatus=? where seq=?

dao.name: UpdateOrderStatus
dao.statement: update PhotoOrder set status=? where seq=?

dao.name: AddOrderLog
dao.statement: insert into order_log(orderNo,GPID,message,createDate) values(?,?,?,?)

dao.name: QueryStyle
dao.statement: select * from PhotoStyle where seq=?

dao.name: QueryStyleBylpicture
dao.statement: select * from PhotoStyle where lpicture=?

dao.name: qa_extras
dao.statement: select * from extras where productSeq=? and kind=?

dao.name: QueryFrames
dao.statement: select * from frames where seq=?

dao.name: UpdateOrderDemoStatus
dao.statement: update PhotoOrder set demoStatus=? where seq=?

dao.name: q_photoorder_page
dao.statement: select * from photoorder_page where kind = ? and orderSeq = ? and page = ?

dao.name: del_orderkinds
dao.statement: delete from orderkinds where seq = ?
